text: Square hiring a content and campaign marketing manager: <https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/Square/743999713645581-content-campaign-marketing-manager-lead-generation>

attachments.title: Content & Campaign Marketing Manager - Lead Generation
attachments.text: Company Description: Square builds common business tools in unconventional ways so more people can start, run, and grow their businesses. When Square started, it was difficult and expensive (or just plain impossible) for some businesses to take credit cards. Square made credit card payments possible for all by turning a mobile phone into a credit card reader. Since then Square has been building an entire business toolkit of both hardware and software products including Square Capital, Square Terminal, Square Payroll, and more. We’re working to find new and better ways to help businesses succeed on their own terms—and we’re looking for people like you to help shape tomorrow at Square. Job Description: Square is looking for a tactical, inspired marketer with a background in copywriting and email to join our Lead Generation Marketing team. The Lead Gen team works to acquire new Square sellers through inbound and outbound engagement strategies. You’ll be the team’s copywriting expert, willing to support all team programs: email nurtures, landing pages, high value content, webinar creation, and more. You’ll work with other marketing teams to create go-to-market strategies from a lead gen perspective. You’ll also support the team by looking for optimizations and expanded growth opportunities within current campaigns. You Will: * Work as Lead Gen’s primary writer, contributing content to emails, landing pages, and high value gated pieces such as webinars, case studies, and guides.    * Develop the tactical lead generation strategy and then create and implement measurable marketing programs that drive demand for our product — through to marketing qualified leads, pipeline, and results reporting. * Strategize cross functionally with the Editorial, Brand, and Experiential marketing teams, as well as, PMMs and other key stakeholders on ways to effectively generate leads within large, nationwide campaigns. * Write creative briefs and manage creative asset development to bring high value, engaging content to life.  * Own campaigns from strategy to execution ensuring projects arrive polished and on time. * Uncover optimizations within the team’s current programs and contribute suggestions for improving opens, clicks, and engagement.  * Help measure and analyze content performance to inform ongoing content strategy. * Support the small/midsize business community by providing stories, content, and information that is relevant and of interest to them. Qualifications: You Have: * 5+ years of post-university work experience and a BA/BS in a related field such as business, marketing, or communications * A love for copywriting and willingness to lend your skills to email, landing pages, and other forms of content * An understanding of digital marketing channels and experience with distribution strategies * Experience making data-driven decisions * Experience working with other teams including, marketers, creatives, analysts and product managers  Even Better:* Experience in B2B marketing, with exposure to both small & medium-size businesses * Marketo and Salesforce experience HTML & CSS * An eye for well-designed emails and landing pages Additional Information: At Square, we value diversity and always treat all employees and job applicants based on merit, qualifications, competence, and talent. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance. Applicants in need of special assistance or accommodation during the interview process or in accessing our website may contact us by sending an email to assistance(at)<http://squareup.com|squareup.com>. We will treat your request as confidentially as possible. In your email, please include your name and preferred method of contact, and we will respond as soon as possible. Perks At Square, we want you to be well and thrive. Our global benefits package includes: * Healthcare coverage * Retirement Plans * Employee Stock Purchase Program * Wellness perks * Paid parental leave * Flexible time off * Learning and Development resources
